schema.description: All data related to a User in the application

userSubmittedCode.description: the code that the user received over SMS

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity suggestion

title.description: The title of the activity suggestion

description.description: The description of the activity suggestion

publicImageUrl.description: The public URL of the image associated with the activity suggestion

category.description: The category of the activity suggestion

stateOrProvince.description: State or province of the location

chat.description: a chat message from one user to another user

createdByUserId.description: the id of the user who created this chat

createdByFirstName.description: the first name of the user who created this chat

likedByUserIds.description: a list of all the user ids who have liked this chat

chatSession.description: a logical container representing all chat messages related to a troov

status.description:
Status of the match request:
 * OPENING_REQUEST  | User has issued a request to join a troov but the troov creator has not yet responded
 * ACTIVE           | Active chat between the participants
 * NON_ACTIVE       | Non active chat between the participants
 * BLOCKED          | One of the chat participants has blocked the other

troovId.description: the id of the troov this chat session is associated with

troovCreatorUserId.description: the user id of the troov creator

participantUserIds.description: a list of all the chat session participants user ids

participantProfiles.description: a list of all the chat session participants profiles

messages.description: a list of all the chats in this chat session

mostRecentChatUserId.description: the user id of the user who sent the most recent chat

lastViewedBy.description: an array of user ids and when they last viewed the chat session

isAdminChatSession.description: whether this is an admin chat

ethnicity.description: * AMERICAN_INDIAN - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent * BLACK - A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa * EAST_ASIAN - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent * HISPANIC - A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin * MIDDLE_EASTERN - For example Egypt * PACIFIC_ISLANDER - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. * SOUTH_ASIAN - For example India * WHITE - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa * NOT_DISCLOSED

moderationCodes.description: * DRUGS - Content that promotes or glorifies hard drug use (marijuana is acceptable). * HARASSMENT - Content that is abusive, threatening, or harassing. * HATE_SPEECH - Content that promotes discrimination, hatred, or violence against individuals or groups. * OBSCENITY - Content that contains explicit and gross sexual content. * PROFANITY - Content that contains offensive language, including attempts to mask profanity. * PROMOTION - Only content that contains a url or similar. If the content promotes a specific location, then it is acceptable. * PROSTITUTION - Content that promotes or advertises prostitution or the sale of personal sexual services. * SOLICITATION - Content that solicits or requests personal information or financial information. * VIOLENCE - Content that depicts or promotes violence, including physical harm, sexual harm, emotional harm, and self-harm.

moderationModel.description: Describes the model that was used to determine the suitability of a troov (could be human review).

discoverFilterSettings.description: all relevant attributes for filtering troovs

initialPageLimit.description: number of troovs to be fetched initially

perPageLimit.description: number of troovs to be fetched per page while paginating

nextPageToken.description: token to fetch next page of troovs while paginating

limit.description: total number of troovs that can be fetched from a single query

discoverTroovsResponse.description: represents the response of the discover troovs endpoint

nextPageToken.description: A token to be used to fetch the next page of results, null if there are no more results.

numTroovsFound.description: total number of troovs found in the search query

healthStatusResponse.description: The api health status for each environment

location.description: information pertaining to a specific location

locationQueryable.description: Used to query for location and combines hidden and visible location information. Note that name and placeId will be null if the location is hidden and the queryableCoordinates and queryableGeoHash will be based of a randomized centroid.

locationIndicator.description: Instead of using the composition anyOf because it creates additional complexity to support on the client side, we define a composition class which handles both the case where the location is provided and hidden. When location is hidden, then only the location field will be empty.

hidden.description: indicates if the location is hidden from the consumer

status.description:
Status of the notification:
 * READ      | The user has read the notification
 * UNREAD    | The user has not read the notification
 * CANCELLED | The notification has been cancelled

statusUpdatedAt.description: the last time at which the status was updated

profileFilterAttributes.description: properties on a User's Profile which are filterable

verified.description: indicates whether or not the user's profile is verified

profileMedia.description: represents any form of media associated with a profile

mediaId.description: A unique reference to the Image when it is being created.

rank.description: The relative ordering of the profile media

size.description: size of the file in bytes

mediaUrl.description: The location of the media. This is set internally and only included on return responses.

supportChatResponse.description: Only chats which are created from the troov support bot

troov.description: The primary date object Input fields (POST? vs. GET?)

matchRequests.description: a list of all the match requests

indexedFields.description: helper query lookup fields (related to Firestore implementation)

matchRequestUserIds.description: a list of all the user ids which have requested a match for this troov

confirmedUserIds.description: the users ids of the creator and confirmed matcher

notifyUserIds.description: a list of all the user ids which should be notified upon updates to this troov

activityCategorySubLabels.description: a list of all the activity categories and concatenated sub labels associated with the troov for searching

participantReviews.description: a list of all the reviews for the participants of the troov

viewedBy.description: a list of all the user ids which have viewed this troov

suitabilityScore.description: The suitability score of the troov from 0 to 1 where 0 is the worst and 1 is the best

activitySubLabels.description: a list of all the activity sub labels associated with the troov

activityCategories.description: a list of all the activity categories associated with the troov

troovCoreDetailFilterAttributes.description: all filters relating to the details of the troov

startTimeRange.description: start of range filter for date start times

endTimeRange.description: end of range filter for date start times

filterTimezone.description: * GMT: Greenwich Mean Time (displays the same time as UTC) * EDT: America/New_York - Eastern Daylight Time - summer/spring * EST: America/New_York - Eastern Standard Time - winter/autumn * CDT: America/Chicago - Central Daylight Time - summer/spring * CST: America/Chicago - Central Standard Time - winter/autumn * MDT: America/Denver - Mountain Daylight Time - summer/spring * MST: America/Denver - Mountain Standard Time - winter/autumn * PDT: America/Los_Angeles - Pacific Daylight Time - summer/spring * PST: America/Los_Angeles - Pacific Standard Time - winter/autumn

troovCoreDetails.description: Contains the details were are essential to a Troov

title.description: title for the date which appears in all the date preview tiles

details.description: any additional descriptions that the user would like to add to the date

tags.description: users will assign free form text tags to each date to improve searchability

troovMatchRequest.description: A single instance of a match request initiated by a user wanting to join a troov.

status.description:
Status of the match request:
 * CONFIRMED   | The creator of the troov has approved the request
 * DECLINED    | The creator of the troov has declined this request
 * PENDING     | The requester is still pending a reply from the troov creator
 * CANCELLED   | The requester has cancelled this troov request
 * EXPIRED     | This troov request has expired

statusUpdatedAt.description: the last time at which the status was updated

openingChatMessage.description: store the first message here for easy accessibility to the frontend

chatSessionId.description: the id of the chat session associated with this troov match request

troovId.description: the troov to which this request belongs

moderate.description: Indicates if the troov should be moderated

suitabilityScore.description: The suitability score of the troov

scoreJustification.description: The justification for the suitability score

rating.description: The rating of the troov from 1 to 5 where 1 is the worst and 5 is the best

notes.description: The notes of the troov review

allParticipantsShowedUp.description: Indicates if all participants showed up to the troov

participantsMatchedProfileAttributes.description: Indicates if the participants matched their profile attributes (e.g. name, profile photos, etc.)

troovSearchable.description: Subset of searchable fields on a troov

tags.description: Users will assign free-form text tags to each date to improve searchability

startTime.description: Unix timestamp (since Typesense doesn't support native datetime)

troovStatus.description:
Status of the match request:
 * CONFIRMED                 | The creator of the troov has approved the match request
 * OPEN                      | The troov creator has not confirmed with any other user
 * CANCELLED_BY_CREATOR      | The troov creator cancelled this troov
 * CANCELLED_BY_REQUESTER    | The requester cancelled this troov
 * PENDING_REVIEW            | The troov is completed and pending review
 * COMPLETED                 | The troov creator went on a troov and its confirmed via review
 * NO_SHOW_BY_CREATOR        | The troov creator did not show up to the date
 * NO_SHOW_BY_REQUESTER      | The requester did not show up to the date
 * EXPIRED                   | The troov is past start date with no confirmations

usageStatistics.description: Represents the usage statistics for a user

troovsCreatedCount.description: The number of troovs created by the user

troovsConfirmedCount.description: The number of troovs confirmed by the user

troovJoinRequestsCount.description: The number of troov join requests made by the user

troovsViewedCount.description: The number of troovs viewed by the user

user.description: All data related to a User in the application

userId.description: represents a unique identifier for all users in the application

active.description: indicates if the user's account is active

numCredits.description: users can use app credits for access to enhanced features

phoneNumberVerification.description: determines if the user's phone number has been verified

iOSDeviceToken.description: user iOS device 32 char token found under didRegisterForRemoteNotificationsWithDeviceToken (but larger on simulator)

blockedUsers.description: all the users which this user has blocked

troovReviews.description: all the reviews for the user

userProfile.description: all properties related to the user's public profile

verified.description: indicates whether or not the user's profile is verified
